member.name: T:ModuleInitializer
member.summary: Used by the ModuleInit. All code inside the Initialize method is ran as soon as the assembly is loaded.

member.name: T:TinyHtml.Wpf.WpfHtmlControlBase
member.summary: This is just here as a proxy to C++/CLI

member.name: M:TinyHtml.Wpf.WpfHtmlControlBase.SetMasterStylesheet(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the master style sheet that is used to define default HTML rendering. A default css file comes with the package.

member.name: P:TinyHtml.Wpf.WpfHtmlControlBase.Html
member.summary: HTML content to use for rendering.

member.name: M:TinyHtml.Wpf.WpfHtmlControlBase.OnLoadResource(System.String)
member.summary: Override this to implement resource loading. Currently used for images.
member.param: Url like it is defined in HTML.
member.returns: Stream that contains the resource. The control will dispose this, if it is no longer needed.

member.name: M:TinyHtml.Wpf.WpfHtmlControlBase.LoadHtml(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the given HTML and CSS content.

member.name: P:TinyHtml.Wpf.WpfHtmlControlBase.FontSizeProperty
member.summary: Font size to use as default font size when rendering HTML.

member.name: T:TinyHtml.Wpf.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TinyHtml.Wpf.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TinyHtml.Wpf.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
